Articles.Content:
I recently upgraded to 1.11, but not 1.11.1

I'm not sure if the mods I have installed will work with the latest version, so I have gone to 1.11.1 yet

My issue is that the KSP website will only let me install 1.6.1, which refuses to cooperate with 1.11.0

Should I update, or can I get 1.6 somewhere else?

On 1/31/2021 at 8:44 PM, Spaceman.Spiff said:

I recently upgraded to 1.11, but not 1.11.1

I'm not sure if the mods I have installed will work with the latest version, so I have gone to 1.11.1 yet

My issue is that the KSP website will only let me install 1.6.1, which refuses to cooperate with 1.11.0

Should I update, or can I get 1.6 somewhere else? 

Er, Steam has 1.6.1 listed as a beta option.

If it's not available on the KSP website then I don't see any other legitimate options to refer you to. 

As for what you should do... depends on what your choice of mods supports better, I suppose.

18 minutes ago, Kielm said:

er, I suppose

Sorry, should have clarified. 
I updated to 1.11.1 so it’s not an issue anymore.
